author: nzola8
title: Lokole Education Centre in DR Congo
description: More than 40% of the African population is not connected to the internet and many more do not have access to affordable education.
solution: We have built an off/online portable web and email network called "Lokole" to help establish a truly African  network for digital education.
experience: Group of Open Source developers, software engineers, coders and electronic technicians using Python, Microsoft Azure, Flask, GitHub, & RPi.
